revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Product-list mv1000w.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless Edge Computing Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.gl-inet.com/products/gl-mv1000/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GL.iNet |model = GL-MV1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = W |revision = (Brume-W) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFIW-MV1000W |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = GL-MV100W_V1.0 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F3720; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FWSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5AN8G6NCJR-VKC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6341; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 94:83:C4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.03;armada-17.10.2-g7c5f0b2; |stockos = Linux;4.14.151;OpenWrt 19.07.0-rc1;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB 3.0 (Type C)
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, external antennas, I2C |addchip = 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE8.1;;1;,,, High PSRR High Speed CMOS LDO;Way-On;WR0332;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = GL-MV1000-XXX |defaultssid_regex = ^GL-MV1000-[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu 18.04
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/10/2019 |estreldate = 07/2020 |estprice = 130 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08DCFBV3H |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Fn-Link 6192K-UEL |rad1modif = USB (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192EU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] Armada 88F3720 @1.0GHz :SoC: Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 16MB (NOR) Flash, 8GB eMMC Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC card *Memory: 1GB (DDR4) RAM *USB: 1x USB 3.0 Type-C, 1x USB 2.0 ports *WiFi: [[Realtek]] RTL8192EU :802.11bgn (2T2R) *Network: 3x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 4-pin connector (unpopulated) *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== :[https://store.gl-inet.com/products/brume-gl-mv1000w Official Shop] :[https://docs.gl-inet.com/en/3/setup/gl-mv1000w/first_time_setup/ Docs] :[https://forum.gl-inet.com/ Official Forum]
